page.title: Australia #39;s Warne Strikes Early as India Slumps to 95-4 in Test
page.text: Shane Warne took a wicket with his second ball as India #39;s cricketers, trailing 1-0 in the four-match series, slumped to 95-4 at tea after bowling out Australia for 398 on day two of the third Test at Nagpur.
